html:
Hard Surface 3D Vehicle Production

This module focuses on learning techniques to produce vehicle models for Games. Students will produce a portfolio of vehicle assets and implement them into a games engine.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Show critical understanding of hard surface modelling and texturing techniques.

+  Analyse vehicle modelling techniques and develop a workflow based upon research and testing.

+  Integrate vehicle assets into game engines showing an understanding industry specifications and limitations.

+  Reflection upon development workflows and analyse your creative process.

Module Content:
